properties.description: Create GarminFiles DB and view for the activites data

content.query:
USE MASTER
GO

-- Drop database if it exists
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS GarminFiles
GO

-- Create new database
CREATE DATABASE [GarminFiles]
GO

USE GarminFiles
GO


-- There is no credential in data surce. We are using public storage account which doesn't need a secret.
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE MyGarminPQfiles
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://personalprojectsrslake.dfs.core.windows.net/')
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vwGarminActivity
GO

CREATE VIEW vwGarminActivity AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET
        (
        BULK '/personalprojectsfs/synapse/workspaces/personalprojectsrgsynapse/DataFiles/Garmin/garmin_get_activities_by_date-2*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'MyGarminPQfiles',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
        )
        WITH
            (
                [activityId] BIGINT,
                [activityName] VARCHAR (4000),
                [startTimeLocal] VARCHAR (4000),
                [startTimeGMT] VARCHAR (4000),
                [distance] FLOAT,
                [duration] FLOAT,
                [elapsedDuration] FLOAT,
                [movingDuration] FLOAT,
                [averageSpeed] FLOAT,
                [hasPolyline] BIT,
                [hasImages] BIT,
                [ownerId] BIGINT,
                [ownerDisplayName] VARCHAR (4000),
                [ownerFullName] VARCHAR (4000),
                [ownerProfileImageUrlSmall] VARCHAR (4000),
                [ownerProfileImageUrlMedium] VARCHAR (4000),
                [ownerProfileImageUrlLarge] VARCHAR (4000),
                [calories] FLOAT,
                [bmrCalories] FLOAT,
                [averageHR] FLOAT,
                [maxHR] FLOAT,
                [steps] BIGINT,
                [userRoles] VARCHAR (4000),
                [userPro] BIT,
                [hasVideo] BIT,
                [timeZoneId] BIGINT,
                [beginTimestamp] BIGINT,
                [sportTypeId] BIGINT,
                [deviceId] BIGINT,
                [summarizedExerciseSets] VARCHAR (4000),
                [manufacturer] VARCHAR (4000),
                [lapCount] BIGINT,
                [waterEstimated] FLOAT,
                [totalSets] BIGINT,
                [activeSets] BIGINT,
                [totalReps] BIGINT,
                [minActivityLapDuration] FLOAT,
                [splitSummaries] VARCHAR (4000),
                [hasSplits] BIT,
                [moderateIntensityMinutes] BIGINT,
                [vigorousIntensityMinutes] BIGINT,
                [differenceBodyBattery] BIGINT,
                [pr] BIT,
                [autoCalcCalories] BIT,
                [elevationCorrected] BIT,
                [atpActivity] BIT,
                [favorite] BIT,
                [decoDive] BIT,
                [parent] BIT,
                [purposeful] BIT,
                [manualActivity] BIT,
                [activityType.typeId] BIGINT,
                [activityType.typeKey] VARCHAR (4000),
                [activityType.parentTypeId] BIGINT,
                [activityType.isHidden] BIT,
                [activityType.restricted] BIT,
                [activityType.trimmable] BIT,
                [eventType.typeId] BIGINT,
                [eventType.typeKey] VARCHAR (4000),
                [eventType.sortOrder] BIGINT,
                [privacy.typeId] BIGINT,
                [privacy.typeKey] VARCHAR (4000),
                [summarizedDiveInfo.summarizedDiveGases] FLOAT,
                [elevationGain] FLOAT,
                [elevationLoss] FLOAT,
                [maxSpeed] FLOAT,
                [startLatitude] FLOAT,
                [startLongitude] FLOAT,
                [averageRunningCadenceInStepsPerMinute] FLOAT,
                [maxRunningCadenceInStepsPerMinute] FLOAT,
                [avgStrideLength] FLOAT,
                [minElevation] FLOAT,
                [maxElevation] FLOAT,
                [maxDoubleCadence] FLOAT,
                [maxVerticalSpeed] FLOAT,
                [locationName] VARCHAR (4000),
                [endLatitude] FLOAT,
                [endLongitude] FLOAT,
                [vO2MaxValue] FLOAT
            )
         AS uspv;


-- Test
-- select * from vwGarminActivity
